Ratings.comment: Dr. Grassman's lectures are clear and you can learn a lot from him about renewable energy and photovoltaics. However, his lectures can be dry and he grades harshly because he wants you to write great proposals. There is no homework for this class which means you need to put a lot of time into the papers to do well. Good class but it isn't easy.

The class is not very hard. He is very knowledgable in his subject. He has a lot of industrial experience. Definitely talk to him outside of class if you don't get everything in lecture. He explains better one-on-one.  Pop quizzes at least once a week usually over his summary slides. Tests not hard at all as long as you study. Very fair.

Boring and easy lecture, but he gives pop quiz like 3 times every two weeks, with the materials he DID NOT EVEN COVER FULLY in his lecture. All he wants to do is make a class with mediocre hardness to be miserable for students.
